structure.unit: A PLANNING AND OVERSIGHT OF GOVERNMENTAL FINANCE

law.catch_line: Legislative Research Commission's responsibility for staffing and operating costs of board.
law.text: The Legislative Research Commission shall have exclusive jurisdiction over the employment of personnel necessary to carry out the provisions of KRS Chapter 7A. Staff and operating costs of the Capital Planning Advisory Board shall be provided from the budget of the Legislative Research Commission.
law.history: Amended 1992 Ky. Acts ch. 41, sec. 1, effective July 14, 1992. -- Created 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 503, sec. 7, effective July 13, 1990.
